story:
~~~~~~~~~Thank you for taking the time to view my campaign!~~~~~~~~~

Candid Rouge Beauty Apothecary is an all natural cosmetic company that focuses on optimal color blending for all skin tones with dedicated research for the most suitable ingredients.  My products are made with ingredients that are nourishing for all skin types and are skin tone adjusting to enhance any complexion.  Some of my favorite ingredients include:

~Carrot Oil - provides skin protection and helps to repair prior damage.

~Jojoba Oil -  helps regulate oil production and reduces inflammation.

~Neem Extract - reduces bacteria and fungi that can build up and lead to blemishes.

My color blending technique utilizes color theory, skin shades, and knowledge of undertones.  With these factors in mind, we are able to create beautiful colors that brighten the skin and adjust for any complexion.

Candid Rouge Beauty Apothecary was created to bridge the gap between natural cosmetics and all complexions.  As an esthetician and makeup artist for the past seven years, I have noticed that affordable natural cosmetic lines that contain beneficial ingredients for the skin do not include all skin tones.  Lighter and darker complexions are often left out.  Tans, olives, and deeper complexions can result in an unnatural color due to the usage of a ruddy or pink undertone. 

I have dreamed of having my own cosmetic line since I was thirteen. I have developed knowledge and experience dedicated to making that dream come true.  I have put careful research into everything from the ingredients to the name of the company so that my experience and my passion can shine through my products.

I am currently utilizing Etsy.com, and in the past 30 days have noticed an increase in awareness and sales.  I have recently been approached by a few salon and boutique owners interested in displaying my products at their locations.  I have a solid foundation.  Your donation will help me to get to the next level by boosting my online sales and placing phenomenal cosmetics into these salons and boutiques. 

                                         


For my campaign I am looking to raise $750.

~$300 will be used to get insurance for my business

~$445 will be used to invest in inventory 

~$55 will be used for copyrighting

I have invested around $1000 to get my company started and I am at a great point.  This is why I am only looking to raise a low amount. The $1000 I have invested went toward research and development, inventory, and general start up costs. 

Currently inventory is at a minimum (which keeps the products fresh), but with the increase in sales and awareness coming swiftly, I need to produce more inventory to keep up with demand.  With the sales coming in, I know where the current demand is and can appropriate funds accordingly.  With my company growing rapidly, I also need to invest in some proprietaries to protect my investment. 

My first priority is the proprietaries then I will start adding to my current inventory as currently I am able to keep up with demand.  


!!!PERKS!!!

I will be offering perks for donations of $1, $5, $10, $25, $50, $100.

I am ever grateful all donations to my campaign .  I have perks including coupons, samplers, and full size kits.  Please view the perks sections to see full details. See below for perk options.  I know you will be pleased with what I have to offer!

Candid Rouge Beauty Apothecary has had a great start. I have seen a 65% increase in sales in the last 30 days and am on track to do more in the next month.  Candid Rouge is starting with a small collection of products to create the perfect face and two aromatherapy products.  These products include: stick foundation, which can also be used as a concealer, mineral powder foundation that is infused for added nourishment, color sticks for eyes, cheeks, and lips, blush color, lip balms for chapped lips, Himalayan salt scrubs for face and body, and herbal sachets to soothe and relax in the bath. 

 At the beginning of the year, Candid Rouge plans to start expanding to a full cosmetic line that will also include skin care, aromatherapy, and some jewelry pieces.  I will create a new product schedule based on the company needs and the requests of my existing customers.


Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that not everybody that views my campaign will be able to donate.  No worries!  There are other ways you contribute to help.

~View my Etsy shop at www.etsy.com/shop/CandidRouge. Your views and favorites will help to boost the shop's SEO and make it easier to search and find.

~Like me on facebook at www.facebook.com/Candid-Rouge-Beauty-Apothecary-648823261930819.  I post periodically about makeup, skincare and aromatherapy, as well as new and exciting product development.  Your likes will boost my search-ability on google. (I am already on the first page, but more likes will ensure I stay there)

~Follow me on instagram at https://instagram.com/candidrouge. Instagram is becoming just as valuable as facebook (and maybe a little more valuable) for businesses.  So your likes and follows will help to raise more awareness about my brand.

And of course share in any way to anyone you think would be excited about my business and its growth. Family, friends, followers.  It makes all the difference!

Thank you once again for you interest!

If there are any question I can help you with, please don't hesitate to contact me.  I am happy to answer any questions or provide more information.

Thank you,

Destiny J.

candidrouge@outlook.com

                                   Here are the perk option for donations.

Foundations and Powders

Porcelain: Light - neutral to warm undertones
Fair: Light - neutral to cool undertones
Ivory: Medium - warm undertones
Nude: Medium - neutral undertones
Honey: Medium - cool undertones
Tan: Light tan complexions
Almond: Medium tan complexions
Golden: Dark tan complexions
Amber: Dark - Warm undertones
Cocoa: Dark - Neutral Undertones

Blush and Color Sticks:~Sheer Peach~Pink Petals~Plum Rouge~Bronzed Glow

LIp Balms: ~Mint/Vanilla~Peach ~Honey~Candid 

Himalayan Salt Scrubs:~Rose~Jasmine Sweet Orange~Lavender Vanilla~Lemongrass Honeysuckle

Herbal Sachets: Epsom Salt and dried roses or Oatmeal and dried roses (Choose scent from the himalayan salt scrub choices)

story:
We received the first production samples of Artemis -Protecting the Innocent- today, 12-4-15.   Artemis in NOW A REALITY!

You may wonder if polycarbonate is strong enough to protect your family.   https://youtu.be/XTYfPsz954k .  Check out this short video.  I think it will help!

We will now produce a limited number of Artemis cases to provide to some of the initial backers who asked to be the first to receive product so they can provide additional, real-world, feedback for final adjustments before major production begins.

Time is running out for YOU to be one of the initial backers who had the foresight to be part of this, game-changing endeavor to protect the innocent while protecting our right to bear arms!  Show you support!  Act now and retain your bragging rights or for ever hold your tong.

311 children age 14 and under were killed in unintentional shootings between 2007 and 2011 — an average of 62 per year.  http://1.usa.gov/1ni8EV8 

Artemis will help!  It is designed to protect the innocent and vulnerable.

Guns hospitalize more than 7,000 children per year in U.S.: study 

About 20 children and teens per day in the U.S. went to the emergency room with a gun injury in 2009, according to a new study of ER data. Six percent ultimately died from their injuries.

http://www.nydailynews.com/life-style/health/guns-injure-7-000-u-s-kids-yearly-study-article-1.1592703


Artemis was featured on Idaho 8 news: http://www.localnews8.com/news/rigby-man-creates-safe-to-protect-kids-from-guns/35946418

And East Idaho News: http://www.eastidahonews.com/2015/10/rigby-man-invents-high-tech-gun-case-to-prevent-child-shootings/ 
 

The 1st mold trial has been completed for all molds.  A second mold trial for the Inner Cover took place today, 11-14-15.  See this trial at: https://youtu.be/C9itAdrk26I.  See pictures of the Inner Cover in the gallery.

The Lid and Case molds are being adjusted currently.  The 2nd mold trial for these molds will take place on 11/21/15.  The following week we will begin assembly production.  Initially, we will produce 20 cases and provide them to some of the initial backers and request feedback from them for final adjustments and tweaking.

We will provide these first testers an additional free case for their help and assistance!

About Artemis:

Artemis is an affordable and secure biometric gun case that will protect you and your family.

Design Features:

The fingerprint scanner, similar to those found on a smart phone, is a secure and reliable alternative to the traditional lock and key or push-button combination type mechanism.  After five failed attempts, an alarm will sound alerting parents of tampering.  The alarm is silenced with any preprogramed fingerprint.

The discrete design allows you to store the case in an accessible location without attracting attention.

Powered by four AA batteries, Artemis keeps your gun secure at all times.  Batteries only need to be replaced about once a year or after about 4,000 operations.  If the batteries are running low, similar to a smoke alarm, an alarm will sound notifying you they need to be replaced soon. 

Why Artemis?

About Artemis:


Polymer Description:

The case is constructed of a weapons grade polycarbonate polymer.  This is one of the key factors in making Artemis so affordable.  These same polymers are used in the production of bulletproof glass and military armor.


Artemis Fingerprint Scanner:

The fingerprint scanner is similar to those found on modern smartphones.  It can record up to 200 unique fingerprints with its high capacity memory, allowing those you chose easy access if needed while you are away.


Programming fingerprints:

The programming process for the fingerprints is similar to the process used for unlocking newer smartphones.  Simply push the interior programming button to begin scanning a finger at various angles to program the fingerprint.  Once programmed, the case will open only upon scanning an authorized fingerprint or by using the high-security tubular lock key provided.


Lock Mechanism:

The Artemis case comes with a tubular key (sometimes referred to as a barrel key), which can fit easily on any keychain.  The key will allow you access for the initial set-up or to change the batteries if needed.  A replacement key can be provided if lost by calling with the serial number of your case.

Alarm Maintenance:

If batteries are running low, or there are five unauthorized attempts to access the case, an alarm will sound to alert parents, which can simply be silenced by a recognized fingerprint scan or by using the provided key.


Who We Are:

Wayne and Maggi, founders of Jones LLC, are parents of three and grandparents of seven.  They saw the need to secure their home.  They explored various avenues of gun security and in doing so they realized cost was a major factor stopping many from securing their guns.  Most options were too expensive and were not reliable.

Wayne and Maggi became determined to remove this barrier.  With over 40 year of experience converting metal products to plastic, they developed a low-cost, reliable gun case.  Cost and reliability are no longer reasons to carelessly leave your home-defense weapon unsecure, exposing your family to needless harm associated with the curiosity of the innocent.

Wayne has been in the product development and manufacturing fields for over 45 years. He is a Master Certified Tool and Die Maker. Wayne developed a program and taught technical college at the DAVC in Kaysville, Utah for computer-aided design (CAD) and manufacturing (CAM).  He has developed and/or assisted in the development of over a thousand products, most of which have primarily been plastic; these products range from confectionary items to SoftSpikes golf cleats.  Wayne holds many patents and is the founder of 15 companies.

Maggi is a partner in, or a member of, several business entities ranging from a craft supplies manufacturer to a real estate investment company. She provides consultation services, creative direction, package design, and performs various duties based upon individual business entity needs.  Maggi holds a Master's degree in Social Work.  She has worked as a social worker in elementary schools which has given her personal insights into the need to better protect our innocent.  Her experience as a member of the Idaho Department of Health & Welfare, Assertive Community Treatment Team has highlighted this need even more.  Innocence lost can never be recovered and the horrible impact of an accidental shooting to an involved family is almost impossible to recover from.  The value of an once of prevention cannot be overstated.

FAQ:


Q.  What makes Artemis DIFFERENT from cases currently on the market?

A. 1.  Artemis is made to protect the INNOCENT from the gun  -- Not the GUN from an INTRUDER.  I feel this is the reason they call their cases saves or vaults.  Artemis is a child-resistant case.  If an adult takes a screwdriver to the existing metal cases now on the market, an adult can break into it.

2.  It is the only case on the market with a fingerprint scanner that works for under $170.00.  The “Second Touch Scanner” technology is unique, reliable and simple to program and operate and specifically developed, by Jones LLC, for use in a gun case.  On this site, until the limit has been reached, you can purchase an Artemis case for $79.00.  Considerably less than half of the price of the next semi-reliable, “gun safe” on the market.  The “Second Touch Scanner” alone costs the manufacture more than half of this cost.

3.  Artemis is made of polycarbonate, an engineering polymer that the plastics industry classifies as unbreakable.  This polymer makes Artemis very child-resistant yet affordable.  The bumper on your car is plastic.  In many instances, plastic is superior to metal.

Q.  Is Artemis powered only by batteries or can it be plugged in?

A.  Only batteries.  However, it will make a sound similar to a smoke alarm when the batteries need to be replaced.  Once a year replacement is sufficient.

Q.  Which guns can fit in the case?

A.  Most weapons designed for concealed carry and sub-compact pistols will fit comfortably inside the Artemis case as well as a limited amount of additional storage capacity.

Most model 1911 handguns will fit well.


Q.  Can the case be factory re-set to delete previously stored fingerprints?

 A.  Yes. The case is equipped with a factory reset button on the inside that can only be used once access is granted into the case.

Q.  Is it water and fire proof?

 A.  No. Artemis case is designed to provide a secure way to house your gun from curious hands. It is designed to be a low-cost secure alternative to bulky, expensive competitor versions.

Q.  Does it come in any other sizes, colors, etc.?

 A.  Not yet. Our intention is to provide different sizes in the future to fit all of your personal needs for securing firearms such as a case for a purse or travel, rifles and shotguns. 

Q.  Will the case be available for purchase at brick and mortar stores?

A.  Not at first. To start the Artemis case is only available online in order to keep the price low, which will allow it to be available to anyone.

Q.  Who is the case for?

A.  Artemis is designed for anyone who wants to protect themselves while protecting the innocent.
story_txt:
We received the first production samples of Artemis -Protecting the Innocent- today, 12-4-15.   Artemis in NOW A REALITY!You may wonder if polycarbonate is strong enough to protect your family.   https://youtu.be/XTYfPsz954k .  Check out this short video.  I think it will help!We will now produce a limited number of Artemis cases to provide to some of the initial backers who asked to be the first to receive product so they can provide additional, real-world, feedback for final adjustments before major production begins.Time is running out for YOU to be one of the initial backers who had the foresight to be part of this, game-changing endeavor to protect the innocent while protecting our right to bear arms!  Show you support!  Act now and retain your bragging rights or for ever hold your tong.311
children age 14 and under were killed in unintentional shootings between 2007
and 2011 — an average of 62 per year.  http://1.usa.gov/1ni8EV8  
Artemis will help!  It is designed to protect the innocent and vulnerable.

Guns hospitalize more than 7,000 children per year in U.S.: study 
About 20 children and teens per day in the U.S. went
to the emergency room with a gun injury in 2009, according to a new study of ER
data. Six percent ultimately died from their injuries.
http://www.nydailynews.com/life-style/health/guns-injure-7-000-u-s-kids-yearly-study-article-1.1592703

Artemis was featured on Idaho 8 news: http://www.localnews8.com/news/rigby-man-creates-safe-to-protect-kids-from-guns/35946418 
And East Idaho News: http://www.eastidahonews.com/2015/10/rigby-man-invents-high-tech-gun-case-to-prevent-child-shootings/  The 1st mold trial has been completed for all molds.  A second mold trial for the Inner Cover took place today, 11-14-15.  See this trial at: https://youtu.be/C9itAdrk26I.  See pictures of the Inner Cover in the gallery.The Lid and Case molds are being adjusted currently.  The 2nd mold trial for these molds will take place on 11/21/15.  The following week we will begin assembly production.  Initially, we will produce 20 cases and provide them to some of the initial backers and request feedback from them for final adjustments and tweaking.We will provide these first testers an additional free case for their help and assistance!

story:
The Vision

Blue Bridal Studio will not only be a bridal boutique offering amazingly modern, beautiful gowns and accessories for brides, in an intimate setting, who seek to display their own personal style on their wedding day. It will also fulfill the creative nature of the little girl inside me who never stop urging me to step forward and do what truly makes my heart happy.

Blue Bridal Studio will offer joy, excitement, beauty, creativity, challenges and require hard work, however, it will be a literal example of who I am and what I can do when focused and determined. I am committed to the success of this venture and I am more than grateful that you are willing to join me on this journey. Each and every contributor will be a brick needed to build a solid foundation on which to start this business venture. 

The Need

Through the process of educating myself to what is required in starting and operating a bridal boutique, I was presented with the challenge of having to purchase all of the sample inventory upfront. This includes all of the gowns and accessories that will be offered for sale in my boutique. This process is unlike a regular speciality clothing boutique. 

I have selected three outstanding wedding dress designers and two amazing bridal accessory designers that will represent my vision and be sold at Blue Bridal Studio. It has been a strategic, pain staking, well-thought out decision for the collaboration of sample gowns and accessories. To make the initial buy in, $25,000 will be needed. Your contribution will go DIRECTLY to the purchasing of the sample inventory. 

The Perks

  • Lace Lovers. Your contribution of $25 or more will garner a heartfelt thank you letter in writing as well as name recognition on Blue Bridal Studio official website under Dream Makers.
  • Sophisticated Sweetheart. Your contribution of $50 or more will garner a heartfelt thank you letter in writing, name recognition on the Blue Bridal Studio official website under Dream Makers as well as a one time use transferrable discount of $10 off $200 or more purchase.
  • Marvelous Mermaid. Your contribution of $75 or more will garner a heartfelt thank you letter in writing, name recognition on the Blue Bridal Studio official website under Dream Makers as well as a one time use transferrable discount of $20 off $400 or more purchase.
  • Bold & Beautiful Ballgown. Your contribution of $100 or more will garner a heartfelt thank you letter in writing, name recognition on the Blue Bridal Studio official website under Dream Makers as well as a one time use transferrable discount of $40 off $800 or more purchase. *Additional perks will be added during the campaign.*

The Impact

Blue Bridal Studio will be operating in Alabaster, Alabama and according to my research there are no operating bridal boutiques in Shelby County. This is a promising attribute in the success of my boutique and the ability to offer elegant, sophisticated wedding gowns to soon-to-be brides in Shelby County and the surrounding areas.

By nature, I am a hardworking, dedicated and highly determined individual and anyone and everyone who knows me can attest to that. I say that to say this, your contribution of any amount will not be taken in vain and please know that the success of this venture is my highest priority. I wouldn't want to take this journey with the backing of your contribution without assuring all of you of my goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

There is an understanding that not everyone will be able to make a contribution, however, EVERYONE can make noise and share this campaign with any and everyone that you feel can and will be able to contribute.  Whatever your contribution to my cause will be, I am eternally grateful to each and everyone of you for your love and support.

story:
Hello, I'm Carrie

I've been in the veterinary world for 18 years. I'm a certified veterinary technician (aka nurse for animals), and spent the last 13 years working with cats only. In that time I had a chance to see how valuable cats are to peoples lives and how they can be over looked by most of the market. Cats are different! I want to help bridge the misunderstandings and help people and cats! 

That is how the idea of Hip Justice Catmunity Center came to be! What better way to help people understand and bond with cat than to have a location with cats looking for people and people looking for love and healing cats can bring! I will also have a location to bring in my peers and mentors to give cat chats about issues cat owners face. 

I need your help

In order to secure a rental location financial stability must be shown (aka money in the bank!). The cost of down payments, building out, furnishing and insurance will be plenty and I have secured some privet investors, but any start up takes a lot to make it successful.  To give you an idea of what is need here's a few numbers!

Ideal rent for space:  $3000 month 

Utilities (electric, WiFi, etc) $1000 month 

Employee wadges         $4000

Cat care!                        $1000

Insurence                       $600

Avarege monthly need: $9600

I would love to have a few months saved before relying solely on the business. That's where you can help me out! 

The Impact 

You can help me succeed and by helping me, you can make a difference in cats lives! Cat cafes around the US have found homes for hundreds of cats. Hip Justice will be unique in offering continuing support for cat owners. 

Risks & Challenges

This is a new and different business model. Because of that it is very hard to judge how successful it will be. Other cat cafes in the US have been doing great. Portland does have one and after spending some time there, I was able to see the popularity of it. That gives me hope that I can succeed. 

Join the mailing list

http://eepurl.com/chbOp1

story:
Introduction - The Party

Convergenza Socialista (‘Socialist Convergence’ in English) is a new socialist political Party of Italy which is growing and needs your help to achieve precise political goals. We deeply think that socialism is the future of humanity. Convergenza Socialista was founded on April 4th 2015, with headquarter in Rome.

 

What We Can Do With Your Support

Thanks to your help we plan to:

  • Open a new headquarter in Rome. We aim at renting a new office space.
  • Expand our reach by opening several branches in Italy. Also in this case, we aim at renting new office spaces.
  • Open our official newspaper. At first online but with your support we might be able to print copies in a systematic way.
  • Start our school for socialist studies and have lectures in Rome and through the internet. We will use our YouTube channel. Further goal would be to have lectures in other cities throughout Italy. Your support will help us sustain all organization expenses.
  • Launch political events to promote the visibility and the growth of the Party. Organize political events in cities and towns, produce advertisement for regional and national newspapers and televisions.
  • Launch social campaign to help difficult situation like sustain local schools with equipment, materials for educational activities.
  • Cover travel expenses, in Europe and around the world. To begin with, your support will help us cover the expenses for the V Congress of the European Left Party, from the 16th to the 18th of December 2016 to which we have been invited.
  • Organize international meeting with the partecipation of socialist political parties and movements. Your support will help us achieve the goal to build connections, construct bridges for the internationalization of socialism.
  • Organize the ‘Festivity of Convergenza Socialista’, starting from 2017. It is a weekend long meeting during which we will involve people, talk about socialism with its policies, struggles and hopes.
  • Bring forward those left behind. You can be part of our political mission around the world.

 

Why we need your support

We do not get any money from the central or local Governments. The only way for us to finance our political activities, in Italy and internationally, is through the support of men and women from all over the world who believe in socialism and socialist policies. Men and women who believe in our action to tackle problems seriously and find the right answers.

 

Our international connections

In Europe we have applied for membership to the Party of the European Left, and internationally we follow with great attention all political processes in North America and Latin-America. In particular, the work done by 'Socialist Convergence’ (USA) started in Philadelphia last July and the work done within the Foro de Sao Paulo, and the ELAP -Ecuador (Encuentro Latinoamericano Progresista).  

 

State of the art in the world 

We could say that, today, we are struggling against political financial dictatorships whose selfish implications are in constant acceleration.

It has been clear since the last subprime mortgage crisis how the world was under attack from a small but powerful financial élite which greatly influences politics and, using accommodating politics, shapes economic and social policies towards wilder, antisocial forms which have as their core more widespread privatization and accelerating sale of public properties.

The struggle today is between the people and the élite. The 99% against the 1%.

The 99% made up of men and women, the peoples of the world, segregated in a national context with national policies and, therefore, localized. The 99 % of the population. The 1 %, instead, made up of the richest with enormous access of big capital whose globalization of banking and financial processes has produced a transnational convergence able to regulate itself, bypassing the various national rules and weak international rules. The remaining 1%.

62 people own as much as the poorest half of the world's population.

Socialism is strategic planning which must expand to be truly effective and to have a real grip in terms of balance of power, in a world irreversibly globalized by the neoliberal system. If the neoliberal doctrine has succeeded in becoming dominant in the whole world, democratic socialism must do the same to have the opportunity to be the political and economic alternative.

Meetings between organizations, political movements and political Parties are, therefore, very important at both national and international level since they lays the foundation for clear socialist platforms. It is, then, necessary to help and to contribute to the growth of organizations and international meetings such as the Party of the European Left, ELAP, Foro de Sao Paulo, ‘Socialist Convergence’ in USA and 'Convergenza Socialista' in Italy.

 

Our way forward

We must, nevertheless, make an extra effort. We must converge on a common political platform with the purpose to revive socialism at a global scale.

Carry your world under your arm.

We have in mind a sort of coordination at a global level for the organization of an annual meeting, rotating in each of the continents, which will allow all of us to proceed quickly towards the internationalism of socialism, with the creation of working committees having the goal to sharpen our socialist policies. Policies alternative to the ones developed in the meetings of the globalized élite.

Today the balance of power between the neoliberal and the socialist camp is very unbalanced . And this is due to the fragmentation within national boundaries, in some cases continental boundaries, of the socialist, progressive and leftist organizations which must confront a neoliberal power which has developed a clear, homogeneous and globalized political and economic platform. We, instead, are untied , politically heterogeneous, and we think it’s time to start our own process of homogenization of socialism, on global scale, on few political points.

Our own proposal on the world. The ‘globalization of socialism’. Proposal which should move along four strategic directions.

On the economic front, we have to reverse course regarding the massive privatizations which in the last decades have caused enormous damage around the world. Whatever is of public interest shall be public. We are referring to natural resources, basic services including the banking system.

Nationalization must be a political point back to the table of worldwide economic platform. Another aspect regards the monetary policy that shall be restored as a ‘public service’, managed by a public entity. Not certainly managed by private Central Banks.

On the social front, full and fair redistribution of wealth.

On the political front, improve the quality of democracies by expanding representativeness, involvement, participation of the people of all social classes. Not marginalize anyone, not leaving anyone behind.

On the mass media/information front. The fourth issue has to do with the enormous and accelerating concentration of information in few hands which distorts the truth, often falsifies it, for special interests. It is a global issue that must be treated globally.

It is clear, therefore, the need for a broad internationalism of socialism which must serve the people of the world on a specific political and economic alternative platform to be able to fight politically the globalized neoliberal system. 

Follow the link to read more about our political platform (in english)

https://convergenzasocialista.com/political-platform/

 

Support Convergenza Socialista. Became part of our political mission worldwide.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We are a political Party which is growing and is making connections worldwide. You can be part of our political mission by getting involved in our organization efforts worldwide. Socialism is the future of humanity, hope for all people.

If you can't help us with our fundraising objectives and if you aren't able to get directly involved in our political activities worldwide, please help us spread the word and share this Indiegogo campaign with your friends.
story_txt:
Introduction - The Party
Convergenza Socialista (‘Socialist Convergence’ in English) is a new socialist political Party of Italy which is growing and needs your help to achieve precise political goals. We deeply think that socialism is the future of humanity. Convergenza Socialista was founded on April 4th 2015, with headquarter in Rome.
 
What We Can Do With Your Support
Thanks to your help we plan to:

Open a new headquarter in Rome. We aim at renting a new office space.
Expand our reach by opening several branches in Italy. Also in this case, we aim at renting new office spaces.
Open our official newspaper. At first online but with your support we might be able to print copies in a systematic way.
Start our school for socialist studies and have lectures in Rome and through the internet. We will use our YouTube channel. Further goal would be to have lectures in other cities throughout Italy. Your support will help us sustain all organization expenses.
Launch political events to promote the visibility and the growth of the Party. Organize political events in cities and towns, produce advertisement for regional and national newspapers and televisions.
Launch social campaign to help difficult situation like sustain local schools with equipment, materials for educational activities.
Cover travel expenses, in Europe and around the world. To begin with, your support will help us cover the expenses for the V Congress of the European Left Party, from the 16th to the 18th of December 2016 to which we have been invited.
Organize international meeting with the partecipation of socialist political parties and movements. Your support will help us achieve the goal to build connections, construct bridges for the internationalization of socialism.
Organize the ‘Festivity of Convergenza Socialista’, starting from 2017. It is a weekend long meeting during which we will involve people, talk about socialism with its policies, struggles and hopes.
Bring forward those left behind. You can be part of our political mission around the world.

 
Why we need your support
We do not get any money from the central or local Governments. The only way for us to finance our political activities, in Italy and internationally, is through the support of men and women from all over the world who believe in socialism and socialist policies. Men and women who believe in our action to tackle problems seriously and find the right answers.
 
Our international connections
In Europe we have applied for membership to the Party of the European Left, and internationally we follow with great attention all political processes in North America and Latin-America. In particular, the work done by 'Socialist Convergence’ (USA) started in Philadelphia last July and the work done within the Foro de Sao Paulo, and the ELAP -Ecuador (Encuentro Latinoamericano Progresista).  
 
State of the art in the world 
We could say that, today, we are struggling against political financial dictatorships whose selfish implications are in constant acceleration.
It has been clear since the last subprime mortgage crisis how the world was under attack from a small but powerful financial élite which greatly influences politics and, using accommodating politics, shapes economic and social policies towards wilder, antisocial forms which have as their core more widespread privatization and accelerating sale of public properties.
The struggle today is between the people and the élite. The 99% against the 1%.

The 99% made up of men and women, the peoples of the world, segregated in a national context with national policies and, therefore, localized. The 99 % of the population. The 1 %, instead, made up of the richest with enormous access of big capital whose globalization of banking and financial processes has produced a transnational convergence able to regulate itself, bypassing the various national rules and weak international rules. The remaining 1%.
62 people own as much as the poorest half of the world's population.

Socialism is strategic planning which must expand to be truly effective and to have a real grip in terms of balance of power, in a world irreversibly globalized by the neoliberal system. If the neoliberal doctrine has succeeded in becoming dominant in the whole world, democratic socialism must do the same to have the opportunity to be the political and economic alternative.
Meetings between organizations, political movements and political Parties are, therefore, very important at both national and international level since they lays the foundation for clear socialist platforms. It is, then, necessary to help and to contribute to the growth of organizations and international meetings such as the Party of the European Left, ELAP, Foro de Sao Paulo, ‘Socialist Convergence’ in USA and 'Convergenza Socialista' in Italy.
 
Our way forward
We must, nevertheless, make an extra effort. We must converge on a common political platform with the purpose to revive socialism at a global scale.
Carry your world under your arm.

We have in mind a sort of coordination at a global level for the organization of an annual meeting, rotating in each of the continents, which will allow all of us to proceed quickly towards the internationalism of socialism, with the creation of working committees having the goal to sharpen our socialist policies. Policies alternative to the ones developed in the meetings of the globalized élite.
Today the balance of power between the neoliberal and the socialist camp is very unbalanced . And this is due to the fragmentation within national boundaries, in some cases continental boundaries, of the socialist, progressive and leftist organizations which must confront a neoliberal power which has developed a clear, homogeneous and globalized political and economic platform. We, instead, are untied , politically heterogeneous, and we think it’s time to start our own process of homogenization of socialism, on global scale, on few political points.
Our own proposal on the world. The ‘globalization of socialism’. Proposal which should move along four strategic directions.
On the economic front, we have to reverse course regarding the massive privatizations which in the last decades have caused enormous damage around the world. Whatever is of public interest shall be public. We are referring to natural resources, basic services including the banking system.
Nationalization must be a political point back to the table of worldwide economic platform. Another aspect regards the monetary policy that shall be restored as a ‘public service’, managed by a public entity. Not certainly managed by private Central Banks.
On the social front, full and fair redistribution of wealth.
On the political front, improve the quality of democracies by expanding representativeness, involvement, participation of the people of all social classes. Not marginalize anyone, not leaving anyone behind.
On the mass media/information front. The fourth issue has to do with the enormous and accelerating concentration of information in few hands which distorts the truth, often falsifies it, for special interests. It is a global issue that must be treated globally.
It is clear, therefore, the need for a broad internationalism of socialism which must serve the people of the world on a specific political and economic alternative platform to be able to fight politically the globalized neoliberal system. 
Follow the link to read more about our political platform (in english)
https://convergenzasocialista.com/political-platform/
 
Support Convergenza Socialista. Became part of our political mission worldwide.


 
Other Ways You Can Help
We are a political Party which is growing and is making connections worldwide. You can be part of our political mission by getting involved in our organization efforts worldwide. Socialism is the future of humanity, hope for all people.
If you can't help us with our fundraising objectives and if you aren't able to get directly involved in our political activities worldwide, please help us spread the word and share this Indiegogo campaign with your friends.

story:
Click Here for english!
L’Echange, c’est un service gratuit et anonyme, implanté dans le centre-ville de Namur depuis 2009 et spécialisé en assuétude. L'objectif est d’offrir aux usagers de drogues, un accès à divers services d’aide dans le respect et le non-jugement. L'équipe est à leur écoute, peut les orienter selon leurs demandes et leurs besoins, les aider à se remettre en ordre socialement ou encore leur permettre l’accès aux soins de santé.

                                                  
                                                                                                      
Notre but

Actuellement, il est difficile pour une ASBL comme la nôtre de trouver des financements. Le concept de « réduction des risques » est encore souvent controversé car peu connu.

Afin d’offrir un accueil agréable et digne aux personnes fréquentant L’Echange, nous souhaiterions pouvoir proposer un peu plus de confort et offrir des services et de la nourriture de meilleures qualités, dans le respect de la dignité humaine.

Ainsi, vous participeriez, d’une part, à l’amélioration de la qualité de vie de ces personnes et d’autre part à la promotion d’un monde plus éthique et plus respectueux de l‘environnement.


En soutenant notre projet, vous nous donnez la possibilité de proposer :


  • Un an de fruits biologiques et locaux (pour 1000€ atteints)

    Lorsqu’on vit en rue et que l’on souffre d’addiction, il est compliqué d’avoir une alimentation équilibrée et cela a des effets négatifs sur le corps et sur le moral. De ce fait, nous souhaiterions proposer des fruits, lors de nos permanences, issue d’une agriculture locale et durable.

  • Un an de café issue du commerce équitable (pour 1500€ atteints)

    Nous offrons déjà du café lors de nos permanences. Cependant, proposer un café respectueux de l’environnement et des travailleurs serait un véritable plus.

  • Un accès aux transports en commun (pour 2000€ atteints)

    Les distances à parcourir sont souvent un frein pour la réalisation des différentes démarches et à la réinsertion des personnes vivant en rue ou dans des conditions précaires. C’est pourquoi nous aimerions proposer des cartes de bus afin qu’ils puissent se déplacer plus aisément.

  • Une pharmacie de première nécessité (pour 2500€ atteints)

    L’accessibilité aux soins est pour nous une priorité. Pour ce faire, nous avons besoin de fonds pour remplir notre pharmacie.

  • Des fonds propres pour pallier à d’éventuelles difficultés

    L’argent supplémentaire constituerait une réserve en cas de coup dur.


Qui sommes-nous ?


L'équipe est spécialisée en réduction des risques liés à l’usage de produits psychotropes : Émilie infirmière en santé communautaire, Élodie sage-femme, François et Jérémy assistants sociaux et Virginie la directrice.

Notre spécificité est la réduction des risques liés à la consommation de drogues. Elle complète d’autres approches qui ont pour but de prévenir ou de diminuer la consommation de drogues.

La « Réduction des risques et des méfaits » concerne les lois, les programmes et les pratiques qui visent principalement à réduire les conséquences néfastes tant au niveau de la santé qu’au niveau socio-économique, sans nécessairement diminuer la consommation de drogues. La réduction des méfaits bénéficie aux personnes qui consomment des drogues, à leurs familles ainsi qu’à la communauté

( http://www.ihra.net/files/2010/06/01/Briefing_What_is_HR_French.pdf)

Dans de nombreux pays du monde entier, la réduction des risques a démontré son efficacité:

  • en réduisant la propagation des maladies transmissibles par voie sanguine (VIH/SIDA, hépatites B et C), des maladies infectieuses, des surdoses et la mortalité,
  • par l’établissement d’un contact entre une population cible difficilement accessible et des services sociaux et sanitaires (structure d’aide, cadre de soins, responsabilisation, etc.),
  • en réduisant les problèmes d'ordre public,…

                       

Malgré tous les efforts déployés dans le monde pour éviter ou supprimer la consommation de drogues, celle-ci existe et existera toujours. La réduction des risques cible un public incapable ou qui n’a pas la volonté d’arrêter de consommer.

A L’Echange, les usagers peuvent recevoir une information claire par rapport aux risques qu’ils prennent ou qu’ils font encourir aux autres. Un programme d’échange de seringues et de matériel stérile dédiés à la consommation est accessible pour un usage plus « safe ». Par ailleurs, nous sensibilisons les usagers à ramener les seringues souillées afin qu’elles soient détruites dans de bonnes conditions ! Nous récupérons dans les lieux publics et les des dépôts sauvages le matériel laissé à l'abandon. L'équipe forme également les personnes qui pourraient se trouver à leur contact.

                         


Les personnes accueillies dans le service sont souvent fragilisées et précaires, isolées, victimes de discrimination, n’ont plus de droits sociaux, un parcours de vie complexe et semés d’embûches. En mettant en avant leurs compétences, nous les aidons à retrouver une certaine confiance en eux, à récupérer leurs droits, une certaine autonomie et même leur dignité.

A L’Echange, nous reconnaissons l’importance de tout changement positif apporté dans la vie d’une personne.


                       

By supporting our project, you give us the possibility to offer :

·  One year of local and organic products.

When an individual lives in the street and suffers from addiction, it is complicated for that person to have a balanced nutrition, which has negative effects on one’s body and morale. Therefore, while we’re on duty, we would like to offer fruits to our guests, issued from local and sustainable agriculture.

·  One year of Fair Trade coffee.

We already offer coffee to our guests while on duty. However, proposing a product that is Fair Trade and sustainable would add much value.

·  Access to public transportation.

The people living in the street or in precarious situations often have a hard time carrying out their different public duties and their reinsertion process due to a lack of mobility. This is why we would want to be able to get them bus passes.

·  A medicine cabinet.

The access to healthcare is a priority for us. In order to make it a reality, we need funds to replenish the supplies of our medicine cabinet.

·  Proper funds to prevent nasty surprises.

The excess money would be saved and used in case for emergencies.

  • 1000€ : One year of fruits from local and organic agriculture.
  • 1500€ : One year of fruits from local and organic agriculture and Fair Trade coffee.
  • 2000€ : One year of fruits from local and organic agriculture and Fair Trade coffee and access to public transportation.
  • 2500€ : One year of fruits from local and organic agriculture and Fair Trade coffee, access to public transportation and supplies of basic medicines.
  • 3000€ and more : One year of fruits from local and organic agriculture and Fair Trade coffee, access to public transportation, supplies of basic medicines and proper funds to prevent any emergency.

Our team is specialized in the reduction of the risks linked to the use of psychotropic substances: one nurse specialized in community health, one midwife, two social assistants and one director.

Our Job

We work at The Exchange. The Exchange is a free and anonymous service, implemented in the center of Namur (Belgium) since 2009 and specialized in addiction. Our goal is to offer to drug users the possibility to have an access to different social assistance services in a respectful and non-judgmental way. Our team is attentive to their needs, guides them with what they ask for, helps them with their paperwork or their civil obligations, or even makes it possible for them to again have access to healthcare.

Our specificity is the reduction of the risks linked to the use of (illegal) drugs. It is combined with other approaches which aim to prevent or to reduce drug use.

‘Harm Reduction’ refers to policies, programs and practices that aim primarily to reduce the adverse health, social and economic consequences of the use of legal and illegal psychoactive drugs without necessarily reducing drug consumption. Harm reduction benefits people who use drugs, their families and the community.

(http://www.ihra.net/files/2010/06/01/Briefing_What_is_HR_English.pdf)

In many countries around the world, harm reduction has proved its effectiveness:

  • by reducing the spreading of blood transmission diseases (AIDS, Hepatitis B and C), infectious diseases, and lowering overdoses and mortality,
  • by establishing a contact between target populations, otherwise hard to reach, and their health & social services (support, ongoing medical care, accountability, and so on).
  • by reducing the problems related to public order,...

Despite a lot of means used through the world to avoid or eradicate drug use, this habit still exists and will always exist. Harm reduction targets a population unable or not willing to stop.

At The Exchange, users can receive clear information about the risk they take or put others at. A program of exchange of syringes and sterile material dedicated to drug use is proposed to reduce potential harm. Besides, we sensitize the users to bring back used syringes so that they can be properly destroyed! We take care of the dumping of waste and we give a training course to the people who may be in contact with them.

The people we help are often weakened, in a precarious situation, isolated, and discriminated. They do not benefit from social rights,and have a more complex life path, that is often filled with problems. By emphasizing their skills, we help them to be more self-confident as well as to bring back their social rights, some autonomy and even their dignity.

At The Exchange, we know the importance of every positive change in an individual’s life.

Our goal

For the moment, it is difficult for a non-profit association (In Belgium : ASBL) such as ours to find funds. The concept of « Harm Reduction » is still very controversial and not very well- known. However, not one negative consequence has yet been demonstrated. Besides, the national and global economic and social climate is not in our favor/is not favorable.

To offer a pleasant and honorable welcome to the people coming to The Exchange, we would like to be able to propose them a little bit more comfort and offer services and food, both of better quality, all of this in the respect of human dignity. You would then contribute to the improvement of the quality of life of our guests, and to the promotion of a more ethical and fairer world, respectful of its environment.

story:
Short Summary

  • About the Creator:
    I’m an interactive web developer by trade. I live in the creative world. For more than twelve years I’ve provided creative brand marketing for some of the worlds largest brands.

  • My experience as a web designer, brand specialist, online brand specialist, UX/UI developer, graphic designer, interactive designer and illustrator affords effective results for all my clients.

  • The Story

    In the summer of 2014, I experienced a St. Louis Cardinals Baseball game from seats behind the dugout. It was the closest I’d been to the players. The roar of the crowd and the fandemonium of red forever changed the way I feel about Professional Sports. My experience in one word, “Grand”.    This  validated my pursuit  of clothing every fan in a Sport Blazer Classic!

     

  • With your help Sport Blazer Classics will move closer to becoming a popular product in your stadium, class and office. This is a product for the "Super Fan" and "Classic Fan".   We are almost there. We are solidifying the pattern and are currently looking for  a domestic manufacturer.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $10,000 to start production of Sport Blazer Classics for every College Town/City and Professional Team
  • Create a Blazer Builder website where customers can build their own blazer with their name and desired number to support their favorite sports team.
  • If our entire requested dollar amount isn't reached, funds raised will be used to further production of the Sport Blazer Classics Product Line.

The Impact

  • This product is for the the Super/Classic fan!
  • Although our product is not currently available for retail, Sport Blazer Classics already has partnerships with  an official supplier for MLB Lettering and Numbers as well as interests and orders from Professional NFL players and Recording Artists
  • This product will change fans outlook on the sporting event experience and give every fan their own sport identity through the custom option.
  • This product will last generations within a sport loving family.

Risks & Challenges

  • To overcome hurdles, Sport Blazer Classics has teamed up with a successful team who specialize in marketing and brand development to solidify our position in the market place
  • The challenges of distribution and partnerships are solved by the relationships we have with leaders in the fashion industry.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you are unable to contribute financially don't fret! Your positive response and word of mouth about Sport Blazer Classics is enough to help this brand achieve market placement
  • Share our product page and let the world know of your love of sports by supporting Sport Blazer Classics!

And that's all there is to it!
story_txt:
Short Summary

About the Creator:I’m an interactive web developer by trade. I live in the creative world. For more than twelve years I’ve provided creative brand marketing for some of the worlds largest brands.
My experience as a web designer, brand specialist, online brand specialist, UX/UI developer, graphic designer, interactive designer and illustrator affords effective results for all my clients.

The Story
In the summer of 2014, I experienced a St. Louis Cardinals Baseball game from seats behind the dugout. It was the closest I’d been to the players. The roar of the crowd and the fandemonium of red forever changed the way I feel about Professional Sports. My experience in one word, “Grand”.    This  validated my pursuit  of clothing every fan in a Sport Blazer Classic!
 

With your help Sport Blazer Classics will move closer to becoming a popular product in your stadium, class and office. This is a product for the "Super Fan" and "Classic Fan".   We are almost there. We are solidifying the pattern and are currently looking for  a domestic manufacturer.


What We Need & What You Get

We need $10,000 to start production of Sport Blazer Classics for every College Town/City and Professional Team
Create a Blazer Builder website where customers can build their own blazer with their name and desired number to support their favorite sports team.
If our entire requested dollar amount isn't reached, funds raised will be used to further production of the Sport Blazer Classics Product Line.



The Impact

This product is for the the Super/Classic fan!
Although our product is not currently available for retail, Sport Blazer Classics already has partnerships with  an official supplier for MLB Lettering and Numbers as well as interests and orders from Professional NFL players and Recording Artists
This product will change fans outlook on the sporting event experience and give every fan their own sport identity through the custom option.
This product will last generations within a sport loving family.


Risks & Challenges

To overcome hurdles, Sport Blazer Classics has teamed up with a successful team who specialize in marketing and brand development to solidify our position in the market place
The challenges of distribution and partnerships are solved by the relationships we have with leaders in the fashion industry.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute financially don't fret! Your positive response and word of mouth about Sport Blazer Classics is enough to help this brand achieve market placement
Share our product page and let the world know of your love of sports by supporting Sport Blazer Classics!

And that's all there is to it!

story:
Click here for the English version

Qui ça? Quoi ça?

Les Gueux, ce sont deux passionnés de bières qui désirent créer des bières de spécialité uniques sur le marché. Pourquoi Les Gueux? Parce que nous sommes des brasseurs itinérants et que nous faisons appel à la solidarité de ceux qui aiment autant la bière que nous.  Notre premier objectif est de faire rayonner notre expertise en collaborant avec nos amis artisans du milieu  brassicole.

La phase initiale de notre projet consiste à concocter des recettes collaboratives avec des microbrasseries pour donner la chance aux amateurs de bières de goûter à ce que nous faisons. Par la suite, à moyen terme, nous allons établir un chai afin d'y faire fermenter et maturer nos bières.

Les Gueux ce sont aussi Andrée-Anne Partridge et Samuel Landry. Elle détentrice d’un baccalauréat en administration, gestionnaire et cerveau des opérations. Lui, brasseur depuis près de 20 ans, créateur d’idées folles et visionnaire.

Crédit photo: Maxime Cloutier

Comment on va faire ça? 

Tout d'abord ça va où 20 000$? Ça peut sembler beaucoup d'argent mais ça ne représente qu'une minime fraction des coûts nécessaires à l'établissement d'une brasserie professionnelle. Nous souhaitons acquérir un système de brassage pilote qui nous servira à élaborer nos recettes et produits de façon rigoureuse. Ces fonds nous serviront également à assurer un minimum d'autonomie lors de notre première année d'existence. Dans le détail:

  • 7 500$ - Système de brassage pilote/petite échelle
  • 5 500$ - Fermenteurs, fûts et quincaillerie diverse
  • 4 000$ - Achat de barriques et matériel d'entrepôt et de manutention
  • 3 000$ - Frais administratifs, notariat, enregistrements, permis, etc.

Si jamais nous n'atteignons pas notre objectif lors de cette campagne, l'emphase sera mise sur les investissements cruciaux tels l'administration et les coûts de départ ainsi que l'acquisition d'un système de brassage pilote. Le reste peut s'ajouter à nos immobilisations dans le futur.

Si (et nous préférons grandement cette éventualité!) nous dépassons les objectifs de cette campagne, il y a une longue liste d'investissements nécessaires à l'établissement d'un chai digne de ce nom: un koelschip, un chariot-élévateur, une capsuleuse, une étiquetteuse, une cuve de conditionnement, etc. À plus long terme, nous envisageons même effectuer la majeure partie du chauffage et de la climatisation par géothermie! Mais comme le dit notre slogan: une barrique à la fois. 

Ce qu'il y a dans la barrique pour toi:

Comme vos contributions nous aideront grandement à remplir les tonneaux de délicieux nectars, nous ne pouvons pas vous laisser le gosier à sec! Dans l'attente de nos produits collaboratifs qui verront le jour dans les pubs et épiceries spécialisées de la province, nous vous remercions de votre support soit en vous remettant divers objets auxquels nous avons porté une attention toute particulière ou en vous invitant à prendre une part entière dans l'expérience brassicole. Nos récompenses sont réparties en trois catégories et même lorsque ça n'est pas spécifié, vous obtiendrez tous le badge des Gueux ainsi qu'une consommation sur place lors de notre premier release.

1. Pour les amis des Gueux

Le verre:

Le chandail:



2. Pour les Gueux de bronze, d'argent et d'or

Pour ceux qui nous offriront une contribution plus substantielle (50$ et plus) la contrepartie inclura tout ce qui a été mentionné ci-haut, accompagné d'un rabais allant jusqu'à 25% lors de notre premier «bottle release» et quelques gratuités pour les «releases» suivants dans certains cas.


3. Pour le Gueux d'un jour, pour toujours ou dans les cieux

Ici on entre réellement dans l'expérience brassicole, partagée directement entre les Gueux et le contributeur. À ce niveau on ne l'appelle même plus contributeur, c'est un collaborateur! Toutes les contreparties de cette catégorie seront aussi accompagné d'un repas en compagnie des Gueux qui se feront un plaisir d'ouvrir de leurs meilleures bouteilles avec vous.


Le Gueux d'un jour:

Que ce soit pour goûter au moût chaud, discuter du choix d'ingrédients, mieux comprendre l'empâtage et le bouillage d'une bière destinée à une longue fermentation en barriques, les différences entre culture pure et fermentation mixte, etc. Aucun sujet n'est hors limite et tous les aspects de la création d'une bière pourront être abordés. Viens découvrir nos façons de faire et partageons ensemble nos connaissances et notre appréciation de la bière! Tu obtiendras aussi un Magnum (1.5L) de notre première bière millésimée.


Le Gueux pour toujours:

Participe activement à l'élaboration d'une bière en collaboration avec Les Gueux! Le processus de développement d'une recette est presque chose sacrée pour nous, empli de surprises et de découvertes, parfois même d'essais et d'erreurs pour en arriver à un résultat satisfaisant. Le sentiment de fierté qui emplit l'artisan accompli, c'est ce que nous désirons partager avec toi! Le choix des ingrédients, un style d'inspiration ou même une idée farfelue, nous désirons approcher cette collaboration avec la plus grande ouverture afin que nous puissions apprendre l'un de l'autre. Cette bière pourra même porter ton nom si tu le désires et nous en développerons l'historique ensemble. Tu obtiendras aussi un Jeroboam (3L) de notre première bière millésimée.


Le Gueux dans les cieux:

Ton palais est toujours bienvenu dans notre grange. Viens te joindre à notre panel de dégustateurs et élaborer notre premier produit millésimé (18-24 mois après l'établissement de notre chai). Viens vivre ce moment empli de fébrilité mais aussi de rigueur, de plaisir et de concentration. Cette consécration s'étend sur deux jours, inclut les repas et l'hébergement (si nécessaire). Prends part à la sélection des barriques et l'assemblage d'un produit qui a mis des années à voir le jour et pourra probablement se conserver pour plusieurs années à venir. L'expérience directe et sensorielle d'un assemblage n'a pas son équivalent, et viendra complémenter le savoir de même les plus grands sommeliers. Tu obtiendras aussi un Mathusalem (6L) de notre première bière millésimée.


Ce qu'il y a dans la barrique pour le futur

En tant que petite entreprise, nous souhaitons établir des façons de faire vertes et durables qui assureront le bien-être des générations futures. Nous souhaitons également établir une notion de terroir et de savoir-faire typique au milieu brassicole québécois ainsi que véhiculer notre passion une barrique à la fois. Sans contributeurs, nos rêves s’en vont tout droit dans le drain. Vos contributions nous permettront d’établir de bonnes bases solides pour bâtir une brasserie d’ici et pour que les amateurs de bière s’en mettent plein la bouche.


D'autres façons d'aider

Tu n’es pas en mesure de contribuer financièrement à notre projet? Tu peux quand même nous aider! Partage, aime, parle parle, jase jase de notre projet à tes amis amateurs de bière! Tu n’as qu’à cliquer sur les icônes à gauche de ton écran pour partager  notre projet sur les médias sociaux!

Au plaisir de trinquer avec vous!


---


English version

Who's that? What's that?

Les Gueux (The Hobos) is a couple of people who are passionate about everything beer, some might say geeks but definitely not snobs. We are intent on creating specialty ales unique to our terroir of Quebec. Why Hobos? Because we are itinerant brewers and we call upon the solidarity of those who are as passionate as we are.

Our initial objective is to display our expertise through collaborative brews with some of our friends in the brewing community. This will give folks a chance to get a taste of what we can do. In the relatively short term we wish to establish a cellar where we can ferment and barrel age our beers.

The Hobos are Andrée-Anne Partridge and Samuel Landry. She is a bachelor in business management, will oversee all operations and let’s face it: she’s the brains of it all. Now the brawns: He is a brewer for more than 20 years, one part mad scientist and one part simple farmer; he will run the shop, create the recipes and inspire the vision behind the products.

Photo: Maxime Cloutier

How are we going to do it?

First off, where does 20 000$ go? It may seem a lot of money, yet it represents only a fraction of the investments necessary to establish a professional brewery.With this initial boost we wish to acquire a pilot (small scale) brewing system that will allow us to develop our recipes and products with more rigor and consistency. These funds will also allow us some minimal autonomy during our first year of existence. More in details:

  • 7 500$ - Pilot / small scale brewing system
  • 5 500$ - Fermenters, kegs and various fittings & plugs
  • 4 000$ - Barrel & warehouse equipments
  • 3 000$ - Administration, notary, permits, etc.

If we do not reach our objectives with this campaign the emphasis will be on crucial start-up costs such as permits and licenses and then the acquisition of a pilot / small scale brewing system. The remaining infra-structures can be added in the future.

If (and we very much prefer this eventuality!) we were to reach beyond our objectives with this campaign, there is a long list of investments that can be fulflilled to establish a cellar worthy of mention: a koelschip, a fork-lift, bottling and labeling equipment, a blending tank, etc. In the long term we even envision most of the heating and air conditioning of our cellar being achieved through geothermy! But, like the slogan says: one barrel at a time.


What's in the barrel for you:

Since your contributions will allow us to fill barrels with delicious nectars, we cannot leave you parched! Whilst waiting for our collaborative brews to hit the shelves of your favorite bottle shop or neighborhood pub, we thank you by awarding you various objects which we devoted a particular attention to. For the more generous contributors we even invite you to take part in the brewing experience! Our rewards are divided in three categories:

1. A friend for the Hobos

Our glass:


Our t-shirt:

2. Bronze, Silver & Golden hobos

For those who offer us a more substantial contribution  (50$ or more) the reward will include all aforementioned perks (t-shirt & glass) coupled with a rebate up to 25% for our first bottle release, even some freebies for the following releases in some cases.

3.Hobo for one day, forever or in the heavens

Here we truly enter within the brewing experience, shared directly between the Hobos and our lovely contributors. At this level, we cease to call them contributors and they become collaborators in the truest sense of the word! All the rewards of this category are coupled with a meal with the Hobos who will gladly open some of their best bottles in your company.

Hobo for a day:

Might it be for a taste of the hot wort, a discussion on key ingredient choices, a better understanding of mashing and boiling for a beer destined to a long fermentation in barrels, differences between pure culture and mixed fermentation, etc. No subjects are off limits and all aspects of beer creation are on the table. Come discover our savoir-faire and let’s share together our knowledge and appreciation of beer! You will also receive a Magnum (1.5L) of our first vintage beer!

Hobo forever:

Elaborate and actively participate in the creation of a new beer in collaboration with The Hobos! The process of creating a new recipe is a sacred thing for us, part science part art, filled with surprises and discoveries and often times many trials and errors to reach a satisfactory result. The sentiment of pride that fills an accomplished artisan, this is what we wish to share with you! The choice of ingredients, a style for inspiration or even a ludicrous idea, we wish to approach this collaboration with openness so that we may all learn something from one another in the process. Up to its name and historic, we will develop this beer together. You will also receive a Jeroboam (3L) of our first vintage beer!

Hobo in the heavens :

Your palate is always welcome in our barn. Come join us in our tasters panel that will elaborate our first vintage beer (18-24 months following the establishment of our cellar). Come live this moment filled with feverishness yet with rigor, with great pleasure yet with focus. This consecration extends over the course of two days, including food and lodging (if necessary). Take part in the selection of barrels and the blending of a product that took years to see the light of day and may very well keep for many years once in the bottle. The direct and sensorial experience of a blending session has no equivalent; it will improve and complement even the greatest sommelier’s knowledge. You will also obtain a Mathusalem (6L) of our first vintage beer!


What's in the barrel for the future?

As a small business, we wish to bring green and enduring practices to this industry so as to ensure the well-being of future generations. We wish to establish a know-how all local and bring an intimate notion of terroir into the world of beer. Sharing our passion one barrel at a time, that’s our goal, so that scale matters very little but quality and character is always at the forefront. Without contributors, much of our dream will hit the drain… Your contributions will help us establish sound and solid bases to build a local brewery that can fulfill your palates.


Other ways to help us

You’re not in a position to contribute financially to our project? You can still help! Share, like, talk, tell everyone how much you wish to see our craftsmanship see the light of day. You only have to click the icons on the left to share our project on social media, the more people know about us, the better. 

Here’s to you, we raise our glass!

boiling for a beer destined to a long fermentation in barrels, differences
between pure culture and mixed fermentation, etc. No subjects are off limits
and all aspects of beer creation are on the table. Come discover our
savoir-faire and let’s share together our knowledge and appreciation of beer! You
will also receive a Magnum (1.5L) of our first vintage beer!

Hobo forever: 
Elaborate and actively participate in the creation
of a new beer in collaboration with The Hobos! The process of creating a new
recipe is a sacred thing for us, part science part art, filled with surprises
and discoveries and often times many trials and errors to reach a satisfactory
result. The sentiment of pride that fills an accomplished artisan, this is what
we wish to share with you! The choice of ingredients, a style for inspiration
or even a ludicrous idea, we wish to approach this collaboration with openness
so that we may all learn something from one another in the process. Up to its
name and historic, we will develop this beer together. You will also receive a Jeroboam
(3L) of our first vintage beer!

Hobo in the heavens :
Your palate is always welcome in our barn. Come
join us in our tasters panel that will elaborate our first vintage beer (18-24
months following the establishment of our cellar). Come live this moment filled
with feverishness yet with rigor, with great pleasure yet with focus. This
consecration extends over the course of two days, including food and lodging
(if necessary). Take part in the selection of barrels and the blending of a product
that took years to see the light of day and may very well keep for many years
once in the bottle. The direct and sensorial experience of a blending session
has no equivalent; it will improve and complement even the greatest sommelier’s
knowledge. You will also obtain a Mathusalem (6L) of our first vintage beer! 
What's in the barrel for the future?
As a small business, we wish to bring green and
enduring practices to this industry so as to ensure the well-being of future
generations. We wish to establish a know-how all local and bring an intimate
notion of terroir into the world of beer. Sharing our passion one barrel at a
time, that’s our goal, so that scale matters very little but quality and
character is always at the forefront. Without contributors, much of our dream
will hit the drain… Your contributions will help us establish sound and solid bases
to build a local brewery that can fulfill your palates.
Other ways to help us
You’re not in a position to contribute financially
to our project? You can still help! Share, like, talk, tell everyone how much
you wish to see our craftsmanship see the light of day. You only have to click
the icons on the left to share our project on social media, the more people
know about us, the better.  

Here’s to you, we raise our
glass!

story:
I've just completed my 2nd Masters degree!!! 

 

As you all know, I graduated both Spelman College and Kings College London with degrees in Child Psychiatry. After working in the field, I decided that this was not for me and that I wanted to give back to the community in a bigger and more consistent way. My Masters in Global Entrepreneurial Management helped to distinguish me and further my credentials, but it also gave me the tools to launch multiple companies and an opportunity to give back across the globe. In Barcelona, I was able to partner with the United Nations on a fundraiser which helped 2 Syrian refugee families have shelter throughout the winter months. 

My plan is to launch 3 companies in the next 4 years, God willing. I am now 27, with 3 degrees, looking to make a global impact. I also plan to pursue a doctorate, author more books (I am already a co-author), and do humanitarian projects in 3rd world countries. An investment into me will lead to an investment to the world. For example, if you've ever donated to the S.E.A. Scholarship fund that I started senior year at Spelman, you're responsible for helping between 1-5 girls graduate college. Perhaps you don't know how to get started on helping others in the world, but I guarantee you, any donation into my life is a donation into another's life because it is my life mission, passion and purpose to empower others and spread God's love. I was just award the "Outstanding Humanitarian Achievement Award" from Rev. Jesse Jackson for the work that I've done with the homeless and disadvataged across London, Barcelona, NYC, ATL, New Orleans and more and I look forward to continuing this legacy. Please help me to get to this goal by donating $40. If 100 of my loved ones do so, I can meet my goal. Check out my website www.meaboykins.com if you would like to know more about my work and experience. Thank you and blessings to you!
